name: Bodapati Bhavya Sree
locations: Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation (APSSDC)

social_work: Discipline Committee Member SRM University AP - Enforced organizational policies and regulations to maintain discipline. Collaborated with committee members to recommend and implement disciplinary actions.

projects.name: A/B Testing for Marketing Campaigns
projects.description: Compared Control Campaign and Test Campaign using A/B testing to drive better marketing decisions. Leveraged Python for data manipulation, visualization, and statistical analysis to optimize campaign performance.

projects.name: Kubernetes Deployment - Clickhouse and Superset on Minikube
projects.description: Deployed Clickhouse using StatefulSet with persistent storage and Superset for real-time BI on Minikube. Successfully connected Clickhouse to Superset, completing the assessment and advancing to the next round.

experiences.description: Co-authored a research paper titled "Single-Camera Video Synopsis Using AOA", focused on creating shorter, informative versions of long video footage, especially for surveillance. Conducted research on video synopsis and optimization algorithms.

experiences.company_name: Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation (APSSDC)
experiences.description: Analyzed marketing campaigns using "A/B testing" to identify the more effective strategy. Focused on key metrics like impressions, clicks, and purchases for data-driven decisions.

full_output.name: Bodapati Bhavya Sree
publications: "Enhancing Video Synopsis Generation: A Single Camera Approach with Arithmetic Optimization Algorithm" Presented at the International Conference on Cognitive and Cloud Computing (IC3COM 2024), University of Engineering and Management, Jaipur, Rajasthan, India.
